title: Long-Form YouTube Video Editor (Science Documentary Niche)
description:
I am looking for a reliable long-term video editor for a faceless YouTube channel in the deep sea / marine science documentary niche.



Reference style: 

Please review the reference video carefully. I am looking for the same documentary-style pacing and cinematic feel.



Job Responsibilities

I will provide the completed voiceover narration (this is the script and is already clean).



Your responsibilities:

— Source relevant royalty-free stock footage

— Edit 20–25 minute long-form YouTube videos

— Add background music

— Add basic subtitles

— Ensure smooth pacing and engaging storytelling



No complex motion graphics are required. This is primarily strong stock footage selection and clean documentary-style editing.



Work Details

— 2-3 videos per week

— Turnaround time: 1–3 days per video

— Pay: $40–$50 per video

— Long-term opportunity available for consistent, high-quality work



Requirements

— Experience editing documentary-style videos

— Strong stock footage sourcing skills

— Good pacing and storytelling sense

— Reliable and able to meet deadlines

— Able to closely match the reference style



How to Apply

— Send ONLY your most relevant documentary-style work (do not send your entire portfolio).

— Briefly explain your experience editing long-form YouTube videos.



Shortlisted applicants will be asked to complete a 1-minute unpaid sample edit using provided voiceover to test fit and style alignment.



Looking forward to working with a serious, long-term editor.

This is not a passive management role. You will personally work files, collect and clear conditions, coordinate with lenders and vendors, and drive loans to closing.



You will manage and process approximately 6–10 loan files per month, with volume increasing as the business grows.



This is a full-time remote position, Monday–Friday, 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM EST.



Responsibilities:



Take full ownership of loan files from contract to closing



Collect, review, and clear conditions



Order and manage appraisals, title, insurance, and VOEs



Prepare and coordinate Closing Disclosures



Communicate directly with lenders, clients, and vendors



Follow up aggressively to meet deadlines



Track and manage pipeline status



Identify risks early and resolve issues proactively



Maintain accurate and organized loan files



Serve as the primary backend support for the Loan Officer



Requirements:



3+ years experience as a loan processor or operations lead



Strong knowledge of mortgage documentation and conditions



Proven ability to manage multiple files independently



Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment



Detail-oriented and deadline-driven



Strong written and verbal communication skills



Experience with Arive and cloud-based systems preferred



Must be proactive, confident, and accountable



Compensation:



Starting at $885–$1,085/month

Performance-based increases after a 60–90 day probationary period

If you understand why some creatives scale and others die within days — keep reading.

Test fast.

Identify Winning Ads.

Scale aggressively.



The German market is demanding.

Language, tonality, and cultural understanding determine performance.



Your videos must convert — not just look good.

You:

 • Have already produced Winning Creatives

title: AI-DRIVEN ORGANIC CONTENT CREATOR (SMM)
description:
Company: Beauty Sleep Club



Role Type: Full-Time Contractor (Remote)



Objective: Scale organic reach to 1M+ monthly views and drive profitable acquisition through high-volume, AI-enhanced short-form video.



THE CORE MISSION



You are a Creator First. You will architect a viral presence by combining raw creative intuition with a cutting-edge AI stack. Your goal is to dominate the "Beauty Sleep Ritual" conversation by producing a massive volume of luxury-minimalist content that converts.



KEY PERFORMANCE INDICATORS (KPIs)



Reach: Achieve and maintain 1,000,000+ views per month across TikTok and Instagram Reels.

Growth: Drive net positive follower growth of 500–2,000+ per month.

Volume: Maintain a strict daily output of 10 high-quality assets.

Sales: Generate consistent, trackable link clicks to our BOGO offer pages.



DAILY CONTENT TARGETS (70 PIECES PER WEEK)

To succeed in this role, you must utilize AI to hit the following daily output:



5x Reels / TikToks: High-reach viral hooks, educational sleep tips, and "Ritual" unboxings.

3x Carousels: Educational deep-dives and aesthetic mood boards designed for "Saves".

2x Image Posts: High-end, luxury-minimalist statics generated/enhanced via Higgsfield.



RESPONSIBILITIES



AI-Native Workflow: Use Higgsfield for premium static ads and motion assets.

Trend Hijacking: Use AI social listening to identify viral trends and "remix" them for Beauty Sleep Club within a 4-hour window.

Platform Mastery: Manage the full end-to-end process of scripting, filming, and AI-editing.

Scheduling: Use Metricool to schedule all 10 daily posts for peak engagement times in the US and AU markets.

Reporting: Track and report weekly on reach, engagement, and link-click conversion metrics.



REQUIRED SKILLS & TOOLS



The AI Stack: Mastery of Higgsfield, ChatGPT/Claude, and AI video editing (CapCut, Captions.ai, or similar).

The Social Stack: Expert-level knowledge of Metricool and Instagram/TikTok algorithms.

Creator Intuition: You know exactly why a video goes viral and how to replicate it.

Aesthetic Alignment: Ability to execute a Luxury Minimalist brand voice that justifies our premium price points.





HOW TO APPLY



Please submit your portfolio and a brief 60-second video explaining how you would use AI to scale Beauty Sleep Club to 1M views this month.

title: Senior Operations Manager (Full-Time | Long-Term | Leadership Role)
description:
We are a fast-growing online coaching company helping high-level women build emotionally safe, healthy relationships.

We are a virtual team of 5 based in Europe and inthe Philippines. Our clients are based in the US, Europe, and Australia.

We are structured. We move fast. We value excellence.

We are looking for the person who will become the operational backbone of the company.



This is NOT an assistant role. This is NOT a task-taking role.

This is a leadership-level execution role.

You will act as the Integrator of the business — ensuring plans turn into execution, and execution turns into measurable results.



Your Mission

==============

You will own the internal performance and execution of the company.

Your success will be measured by:



- On-time launches

- Team task completion rate

- Accurate and consistent business metrics reporting

- Operational improvements implemented quarterly

- High client onboarding and retention standards

- CEO focus time protected



Core Responsibilities

==================

1) Business Metrics & Performance Ownership



- Own and maintain the executive business metrics dashboard

- Coordinate weekly and monthly reporting from all departments

- Analyze performance trends and identify bottlenecks

- Propose operational improvement strategies

- Implement agreed improvements with the team

- Ensure metrics translate into action

- You are comfortable with numbers and performance tracking.

- You do not avoid accountability conversations.



2) Task Deployment & Team Accountability

- Own the company-wide task management board (ClickUp/Asana/Notion)

- Convert strategic plans into step-by-step task roadmaps

- Assign tasks clearly and monitor execution daily

- Hold tea
mbers accountable to deadlines

- Follow up consistently and close loops

- Escalate issues early, not late

- You are not afraid to remind people.

- You do not hesitate to enforce standards.



2) Service Excellence & Client Delivery Oversight



- Ensure smooth and fast onboarding for high-ticket clients

- Coordinate with coaches to maintain delivery standards

- Monitor retention and client journey performance

- Identify operational gaps affecting client experience

- Improve internal systems to support premium delivery

- You are not coaching the clients (we have coaches for this) — you are ensuring operational excellence behind the scenes.



4) CEO Time Protection (10%)



- Manage CEO calendar strategically

- Protect focus time

- Prepare weekly performance summaries

- Anticipate needs before they arise



This is not a heavy admin role.

Your primary focus is operational leadership.



This Role Is For You If:

====================

You have 5+ years in operations or project management, preferably with team leadership expereince

Online coaching or digital business experience is highly preferred

You have managed remote projects or teams before

You take ownership without waiting to be told

Your natural language sounds like: 

“I’ll handle it.”

“This is the bottleneck.”

“Here’s the improvement suggestion.”

“This deadline will slip unless we adjust.”



This Role Is NOT For You If:

You avoid difficult conversations

You need constant supervision

You prefer flexible, unstructured days

You feel stressed by performance tracking

You are looking for a pure admin or assistant role



Details

========

Full-Time (40 hours/week)

Long-term position

Philippines daytime hours required with 3–4 hour overlap with EU time zone

Stable internet required

Leadership-level responsibility



Salary Range: $1,300–$1,500/month depending on experience

Performance-based increases after 6 months

title: Sponsorship Delivery Executive
description:
About Us: Event Strategies produces and owns a range of B2B event properties across a number of industry sectors in Ireland and the UK.



We specialise in planning and executing a wide range of events, from corporate conferences to social gatherings. As we continue to grow, we are seeking a talented and detail-oriented Sponsorship Delivery Executive to join our team and contribute to the success of our events.



Position Overview: As a Sponsorship Delivery Executive, you will play a pivotal role in managing and executing sponsorship packages for various events remotely. The ideal candidate will oversee sponsorship activation, maintain and strengthen client relationships, ensure brand compliance across event materials, track sponsorship deliverables, and oversee the creation of newsletters.



Important note: No second job. Full Irish office hours.



Key Responsibilities:



1. Sponsorship Activation:

• Develop and implement strategic plans to activate sponsorships across various marketing channels, maximizing sponsor visibility and audience engagement.

• Collaborate with internal teams to ensure sponsorship activation aligns with overall event goals and sponsor expectations.



2. Manage Client Relationships:

• Act as the main point of contact for sponsors, fostering strong, trust-based relationships through clear communication and mutual value creation.

• Conduct regular check-ins with sponsors to understand their needs, address concerns, and provide updates.

• Anticipate and proactively resolve any challenges during sponsorship agreements to ensure a smooth and positive experience.



3. Review and Sign Off on Event Materials:

• Review all event materials to ensure compliance with sponsor agreements and adherence to brand guidelines.

• Provide timely feedback and approvals, collaborating with teams to ensure sponsor branding is accurately and consistently represented.



4. Track Sponsorship Deliverables:

• Maintain a detailed tracking system to monitor the status of all sponsorship deliverables, ensuring timely and accurate fulfillment.

• Regularly update sponsors on the progress of deliverables and performance against key metrics.



5. Newsletter Creation:

• Work with the marketing team to craft compelling content and visuals for newsletters that resonate with sponsors and boost engagement.

• Analyze newsletter performance metrics and provide data-driven recommendations for continuous improvement.



Qualifications:

• Proven experience in business client success / customer service is essential.

• Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.

• Ability to thrive under pressure and meet tight deadlines.

• Strong organizational skills with a keen attention to detail.

• Collaborative team player with the ability to work effectively in a dynamic environment.

• Proactive, with a demonstrated ability to take initiative and see tasks through to completion.



Benefits:

• Opportunities for career growth and development.

• Friendly and collaborative work environment.

• Exciting and diverse range of events to work on.



How to Apply: Interested candidates are encouraged to submit their resume and a cover letter detailing their relevant experience to 
 and 
 include "Sponsorship Delivery Executive Application" in the subject line of your
. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis until the position is filled.



Event Strategies is an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.



We look forward to receiving your application and finding the right candidate to join our team and help us continue to deliver exceptional events!

title: IT Delivery & Program Coordinator
description:
IT Delivery & Program Coordinator

Department: Technology

Location: Remote

Employment Type: Full-Time

Job Summary

We are seeking a highly organized and execution-focused IT Delivery and Program Coordinator to support the reliable delivery of technology initiatives across our core platform.

This role is responsible for coordinating day-to-day execution across internal stakeholders and external development partners, ensuring work progresses smoothly from scope through build, QA, and release. The ideal candidate thrives in structured environments, follows through consistently, and proactively identifies and resolves blockers.

This is a delivery coordination role and does not include product strategy or technical architecture responsibilities.

 

Key Responsibilities

• Maintain and update project tracking tools, delivery boards, and milestone plans

• Monitor timelines, dependencies, and risks across active technology initiatives

• Follow up with internal teams and external vendors to ensure timely execution

• Coordinate QA cycles, testing schedules, and release readiness activities

• Organize and document delivery meetings, action items, and progress updates

• Ensure clear visibility into active workstreams and issue status

• Escalate risks and delays appropriately to leadership

• Maintain documentation of systems, ownership, and active initiatives

 

Qualifications

Required:

• 2 to 5 years of experience in project coordination, program support, IT operations, or related roles

• Strong organizational and time management skills

• Experience working with external vendors or technical teams

• Excellent written and verbal communication skills

• Ability to manage multiple workstreams simultaneously

• Strong attention to detail and follow-through

Preferred:

• Experience working in technology, SaaS, or platform-based environments

• Familiarity with project management tools such as Jira, Asana, Trello, or ClickUp

• Experience coordinating QA or release processes

• Basic understanding of the software development lifecycle

 

Skills and Competencies

• Proactive problem-solving

• Structured thinking and documentation discipline

• Comfort operating in evolving or ambiguous environments

• Strong stakeholder coordination skills

• Accountability and reliability

 

What Success Looks Like

• Clear and consistent visibility into delivery progress

• Early identification of risks and blockers

• Structured and predictable vendor coordination

• Organized QA and release processes

• Reduced last-minute escalations and delivery surprises

 

Reporting Structure

This role reports to the Senior Director of Technology & AI Strategy and works closely with internal stakeholders and external development partners.

title: Sales Closer (Outbound Sales Representative / Enrollment Coach)
description:
We are an international relationship coaching company helping high-achieving women build secure, lasting love — without chasing, pressure, or emotional self-abandonment.

We host monthly enrollment events, live workshops, evergreen funnels, and low-ticket offers that feed into our flagship coaching programs.



ABOUT THE ROLE



The Enrollment Coach (Sales Closer / Outbound Sales Representative) is the heart of our business.

You speak to emotionally tender, high-achieving A-type women who are navigating heartbreak, hot-and-cold dynamics, mixed signals, and deep relationship anxiety.

Your mission is to guide women into empowered clarity, help them see what is truly possible, and support them in choosing the next step that aligns with their healing - and enrolling them into our coaching program, the Bring Him Closer Experience, when it is the right fit.

This is not a pushy sales role — it’s a blend of emotional intelligence, leadership, grounded presence, and clean sales psychology.

You are not their therapist, and you don’t “fix” anything on the call.

You lead, gently and powerfully, through a proven structure.

Your goal is simple:

Guide the right women into the right program at the right time.

With sales psychology. With compassion. With confidence. With integrity.



RESPONSIBILITIES



1. Take 1:1 Enrollment Calls (Sales Calls)



Using our signature sales framework, you will:

Build trust & rapport with emotionally vulnerable women

Lead a structured, emotionally safe conversation

Identify their challenges, patterns, and desired outcomes

Help them see the implications of staying where they are

Coach them into clarity without slipping into giving advice 

Present the Bring Him Closer Experience confidently

Handle objections with compassion and leadership

Close the sale if it’s aligned





2. Outbound & Follow-Up Sales



Because many women need space, reassurance, or emotional regulation before d
, you will:

Follow up daily with all und
 prospects

Maintain warm, consistent, emotionally intelligent outreach

Re-engage past leads with voice notes, check-ins, and updates

Build long-term relationships until they convert

Keep leads warm between first and second calls

Move prospects through multi-step decision journeys



3. CRM Management



Daily updates; Clean notes and accurate pipeline tracking; Task reminders and follow-up automation; Reporting daily KPIs



4. Collaboration With Lead Gen Specialist & Social Media Manager



Share feedback on lead quality

Suggest optimizations to scripts, nurture, and messaging

Help ideate content that improves call bookings i.e. share mindset blocks, objections, and shifts that need to be addressed through marketing content to best prepare the leads for your one-on-one conversations.



5. Personal Improvement & Call Review



Review your own call recordings and analyse with AI

Practice objection handling

Develop emotional intelligence skills

Continue growing as a communicator and coach

Participate in weekly tea
etings and trainings



REQUIREMENTS



Experience:

Minimum 1–2 years sales experience - preferably in an online coaching or online education business

Strong outbound sales background (calls, follow-ups, pipeline management)

Experience closing high-ticket or transformation-oriented programs

Experience speaking with emotionally sensitive or personal-development clients is a plus



Tech: 

Excellent English (clear, warm, emotionally attuned communication)

Calm, grounded, compassionate presence on Zoom

Quiet professional environment (no background noise) - Camera ON, no headphones, clean background, reliable internet

Tech-comfortable (CRM, calendar, Zoom, automations)

 

This role requires someone who is:

Highly emotionally intelligent

Warm, grounded, trustworthy

Able to hold space without collapsing into advice or therapy

Confident leading a call

Not afraid of money objections

Not avoidant when conversations get emotional

Coachable, disciplined, self-driven

Hungry for commissions  

Strong follow-through and consistency

Values-aligned: transparency, integrity, growth, ownership  





THIS ROLE IS NOT FOR YOU IF…

You collapse when someone says “I don’t have money”

You let prospects lead the call or emotionally hijack it

You treat sales calls like therapy sessions

You want to rely on a large base salary

You avoid outbound follow-up

You can’t receive feedback without defensiveness

You disappear or become inconsistent in “quiet months”

You get easily overwhelmed by emotional conversations

You can’t work full-time hours consistently

You don’t believe in coaching, healing, or personal development





COMPENSATION

Base + Commission (Target to close of 20k-30k USD / month) + Team Bonus (split across the sales team)

This is a role for someone who is driven — someone who thrives on hitting targets, earning commissions, and growing long-term within the company.



SCHEDULE & EXPECTATIONS

Full-time: 35–45 hours/week

Availability for call blocks

Daily outbound follow-ups

Daily KPI submission

Attendance at tea
etings

Self-review of calls (mandatory)

title: YouTube Shorts Video Editor (with After Effects)
description:
About 37 Projects

We are the #1 Video Podcast Marketing Service for Health & Performance Brands.

We help top experts, nutritionists, doctors, and wellness professionals grow their YouTube presence with engaging, high-quality content.

Now we’re hiring a YouTube Shorts Video Editor with advanced motion graphics skills to join our growing team.





Role Overview

We’re looking for an editor who specializes in fast-paced, high-retention YouTube Shorts and is highly skilled in After Effects motion graphics.

Your work must go beyond simple cutting—you must be able to enhance storytelling through kinetic typography, animated elements, transitions, and visually dynamic scenes.



You’ll be given raw footage and reference edits. Your job: replicate the style, elevate it, and deliver polished 9:16 vertical videos.



Key Responsibilities

- Edit 60–90 second YouTube Shorts using high-retention editing techniques.

- Create custom motion graphics in After Effects (this is a MUST).

- Design high-quality kinetic text, animated highlights, and visual callouts.

- Use smooth transitions, multilayer motion graphics, and dynamic visual pacing.

- Add sound design: music, subtle SFX, and emphasis pops.

- Apply accurate, engaging captions styled for high retention.

- Follow the editing style of our provided samples (Types C, D, E).

- Deliver export-ready 9:16 vertical videos optimized for YouTube Shorts.



Who You Are

- You’ve edited high-retention short-form content (YouTube Shorts, Reels, TikTok).

- You have advanced After Effects motion graphics skills—non-negotiable.

- You’re skilled in Premiere Pro (or DaVinci Resolve) and integrate AE seamlessly.

- You understand dynamic pacing and storytelling for vertical video.

- You can create clean, modern motion design that enhances clarity and emotion.

- Strong sense of design: timing, spacing, typography, colors, visual rhythm.

- Excellent sound design skills: enhancing beats, transitions, and emotional peaks.

- Attention to detail: no choppy cuts, no awkward pauses, no sloppy captions.

- Fast, reliable, and able to deliver consistent high-quality results.



Our 4 Core Principles at 37 Projects

Competence – Always improve, deliver your best, and think strategically.

Commitment – Meet deadlines, own your work, and deliver on time.

Character – Stay professional, solution-oriented, and trustworthy.

Communication – Respond quickly, give updates, and collaborate smoothly.



These principles are required for every tea
mber.

title: Hiring Executive Team: Gamers Wanted
description:
We're looking to hire a full team of VA's to work with us launching TikTok ad campaigns for our agency, RedStream Consulting (
).



There are multiple positions to be filled based on experience. We're looking for data entry VA's, team leaders, managers, video editors, media buyers, and project leads.



Pay starts at $600 a month and increases with performance. We reward performance and timeliness. 



Roles currently available:



1. Business Center Creators:  You will be responsible for creating TikTok business centers daily for us that we run ads on. Everything is clearly defined, and simple to execute. SOPs that teach everything take 30 minutes to finish. Only real qualifying trait we're looking for is full availability during working hours to communicate with team, and attention to detail. Fast workers will be able to create 6 business centers an hour, normal workers around 4 an hour. We're looking for fast.



2. Form Creators: You will work with the business center creators above to populate each business center with forms (standard TikTok advertising options) following our instructions. 



3. Campaign Creators: You'll create campaigns inside the business centers. Gaming computer needed here because it's simple task but needs lots of tabs open. If computer is weak, that's the bottleneck. (example: on a decent computer it takes 5 minutes to do this task, on a slow computer can take 30)



4. Top Up Specialists: High trust position, highest pay. You'll be trusted with our credit cards and asked to top up the ad accounts inside the business centers on a set cadence (once every 15 minutes for example). You'll also be looking at metrics to see which ones are worth topping up, and which ones are not. Attention to detail and financial responsibility very important here.  We require two of these positions per pod. Candidates with ACCOUNTING background preferred.



Quick video explaining how the team will function together: 



To apply, answer the following q's in a QUICK LOOM VIDEO. I need to see what you're like and looms are the best way of doing it. 60 second length is enough as long as you explain the q's below:



1. Which position are you interested in?

2. 8 hours a day shifts, are you okay with that?

3. Do you have a gaming PC? List the specs if yes.

4. Do you have any prior experience running ads, being inside business centers or ads dashboards?

5. Why are you looking for work right now?



PS: After initial trial period, performance will be HEAVILY rewarded



Looking forward to scaling together!

title: Launch and Funnel Operations Manager
description:
ABOUT THE COMPANY



We are an international relationship coaching company helping high-achieving women build secure, lasting love — without chasing, pressure, or emotional self-abandonment.

We host monthly enrollment events, live workshops, evergreen funnels, and low-ticket offers that feed into our flagship coaching programs.

We are growing fast — and we are looking for someone who wants to grow with us and be the operational backbone of our marketing engine.



ABOUT THIS ROLE



This is NOT a VA role. This is NOT only project management. This is NOT only funnel building.

This is a hybrid role for someone who is a doer, skilled in marketing systems and launch execution.

You’re the person who takes ideas ? builds them ? launches them ? tests them ? improves them.

You don’t need to be a strategist yet — strategy is provided — but you must be strong in: Implementation, Execution, funnel tech, organizing timelines, light creative, QA, data interpretation, troubleshooting



This role directly impacts revenue every month.

You are the person who keeps the marketing machine moving.



???? YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:



1) Launch & Campaign Project Management

Manage 1 live enrollment event per month

Manage 1 new mini-offer launch per month

Create timelines, task lists, and follow-up processes

Coordinate content, tech, ads, and sales teams

Ensure all launch assets are delivered on time

Run QA checks before every campaign goes live

Keep the CEO out of the chaos by running the backend smoothly



2) Funnel Setup & Conversion Optimization

You’ll build, update, and maintain: Sales pages, Landing pages, Webinar funnels, Lead magnet funnels, Checkout flows, Thank-you & confirmation pages

You will also: Test headlines, CTA buttons, hero sections, Improve page layout for clarity & conversion, Check form conversion % and drop-off points

Ensure error-free tech (links, automations, tags, tracking)

Identify and fix funnel “leaks”



3) Creative Support  

Create basic Canva graphics (ad creatives, story slides, landing page elements)

Draft alternate headlines & CTAs

Suggest ad angles and launch hooks



4) Analytics, Tracking & Reporting

Pull funnel and launch performance metrics weekly

Monitor CPL, landing page conversion, sales page conversion

Identify what is dropping vs improving

Propose 2–3 test ideas based on data

Provide weekly KPI dashboards



? WHAT SUCCESS LOOKS LIKE (KPIs)

Landing page conversion: 25–40%

Sales page conversion: 2–4%

Cost per lead: ? $4

Launch execution accuracy: 95%+ error-free

On-time deliverables: 90%+

Funnel fix SLA: 48 hours

You don’t need to be a strategist — but you MUST be strong in execution, organization, and tech.



? IDEAL EXPERIENCE

You’ll thrive in this role if you have experience as:

Digital Marketing Coordinator

Funnel Builder

Marketing Assistant (with funnel + PM experience)

Launch Assistant

Junior OBM with tech skills

Marketing VA who has worked for online coaches

Agency junior who handled multiple campaigns/funnels





? YOU MUST BE CONFIDENT IN:

Building simple funnels and pages

Using tools like: Kajabi, ClickFunnels, LeadPages, HighLevel, ThriveCart (any is fine — just be fast at learning)

Canva

Zapier + automation logic

Project management tools (ClickUp, Trello, Notion)

Tracking & interpreting marketing numbers

Fixing things when they break



? YOU ARE A GREAT FIT IF:

You take ownership and finish things

You learn tools fast and love tech

You stay calm during launches

You don’t wait to be told what to do

You communicate proactively

You think in steps and systems

You enjoy improving things month-to-month

You are organized, reliable, and execution-focused

You want a long-term role with growth potential

title: Funnel Builder - Funnelish (Long-Term)
description:
1. FULL JOB DESCRIPTION



Funnel Builder (Full-Time, Long-Term)



We are looking for a highly detail-oriented Funnel Builder to join our growing eCommerce team.

This is a long-term position for someone serious about growing with a company.

You will be responsible for building complete sales funnels from scratch using Funnelish.

This includes:



- Product research/understanding using ChatGPT

- Copywriting

- AI image creation

- GIF creation

- Full funnel build

- Checkout

- Pixel & WeTracked setup

- Automation setup (Shopify to Funnelish)

- Final testing and publishing



You must be able to execute independently and follow instructions exactly.





Work Details:



- $5/hour

- 8 hours/day

- Monday to Saturday

- Long-term role

- Performance-based bonuses available

- Opportunity for hourly increase based on performance





Requirements:



- Experience with Funnelish (REQUIRED)

- Experience building sales funnels

- Canva skills

- Experience using ChatGPT properly

- Extremely Detail-oriented

- Can handle stress & deadlines

- Can follow instructions strictly

- Honest, Responsible & Reliable

- Able to build 2 funnels per day





Growth Opportunity:



We reward performance.

If you consistently perform well and help the business grow, we increase hourly rate and offer bonuses.





2 - APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS



HOW TO APPLY (IMPORTANT)



To make sure you read everything carefully:



Change the subject line of your application to:

"I Am Your Funnel Builder – 2 Funnels Per Day"



In the first line of your message, write:

"I pay attention to detail!"



Also, please include 2 funnel examples you built.



Applications that do not follow these instructions will be automatically rejected.



We are not hiring a “task doer.” We are looking for an executor — someone with initiative who works autonomously, takes ownership, and wants to help build something meaningful.

If you’re seeking long-term stability, real growth, and the opportunity to increase your income as the company scales, this role is for you. We believe in growing together — professionally and financially.

• Have experience editing short form content

Do not apply if:

• You take days to reply

• You miss deadlines

• You overcomplicate simple edits

title: Social Media Manager
description:
Looking for an experienced Social Media Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate should have a passion for social media and be knowledgeable about various social media platforms. The Social Media Manager will be responsible for creating and implementing social media strategies to increase brand awareness, engagement, and overall growth. Additionally, the candidate should have experience in advertising on social media platforms and managing a team.



Key Responsibilities:



Develop and execute social media strategies to increase brand awareness, engagement, and growth.

Create and curate engaging and relevant content for social media platforms such as
, Instagram,
, LinkedIn, and YouTube.

Manage and monitor all social media accounts, respond to comments, messages, and reviews in a timely and professional manner.

Collaborate with internal teams to create and execute social media campaigns to support product launches, events, and promotions.

Stay up-to-date with the latest social media trends, technologies, and best practices.

Create and manage social media advertising campaigns on platforms such as
, Instagram,
, and LinkedIn.

Identify target audiences and develop effective advertising strategies to reach them.

Optimize advertising campaigns to achieve the desired results within budget.

Monitor and analyze the performance of advertising campaigns and make recommendations for improvement.

Manage a team of social media professionals including overseeing an executive, providing direction, setting goals, and assessing performance.



Requirements:



Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.

3+ years of experience in social media management and advertising.

2+ years of management experience with a proven track record of building and leading high-performing teams.

Excellent communication, writing, and editing skills.

Strong understanding of social media platforms and their algorithms.

Proficiency in social media analytics tools.

Demonstrated ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines.

Experience in creating and executing social media campaigns.

Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changes.

If you're passionate about social media, have a creative mindset, and can develop effective strategies that drive engagement, growth, and sales, then we'd love to hear from you.

title: Virtual Assistant (Experienced)
description:
Does this sound like your dream job? To Apply: Please send us a message and we'll share the next steps.



# About Us

We are an established e-commerce brand with over 5 years of consistent growth. We aren’t a startup. We are a professional team of 20 dedicated coworkers worldwide. We already have a fantastic team of 2 VAs based in the Philippines who have been with us for years. As we continue to scale, we are looking for a third experienced Virtual Assistant to join our in-house operations.



# Role Overview

We aren’t looking for a "task-taker"; we are looking for an Operations Partner. You will work alongside our founders and our existing PH-based VA team to keep our daily business running like clockwork. We value your time: We are big believers in work-life balance. When the shift ends, it ends. No weekend work, ever.



# Key Responsibilities

* Operational Oversight: Collaborate with our existing VA team to monitor daily operations and ensure team deliveries on time.

* Data & Reporting: Maintain and update spreadsheets with high accuracy (experience with Google Sheets formulas is a plus).

* Executive Support: Handle professional
 correspondence and assist founders with ad-hoc tasks as the business evolves.

* Project Coordination: Maintain a high-level overview of active business projects and internal processes.



# Requirements

* Experience: Minimum 3 years of experience as a Virtual Assistant.

* Collaboration: A "team-first" mentality. You’ll be working closely with our 2 current VAs.

* Stability: Must have a reliable home office setup with high-speed internet.

* Communication: Elite written and verbal English skills.

* Schedule: Monday – Friday, 4 PM – 12 AM (PhST).



# What We Offer

* Salary: $750/month

* Stability: Join a company with a 5-year track record and a team that stays for the long term.

* Weekends Off: We strictly respect your time off. Enjoy a full Saturday and Sunday every week.

* Supportive Culture: Work within an established system where you have peers to collaborate with.



Does this sound like your dream job? To Apply: Please send us a message and we'll share the next steps.

title: Direct Response Video Editor For Ecom Ads
description:
We’re looking for a high-performance Direct Response Video Editor to join our team full-time (40h/week). We’re a fast-growing DTC brand selling premium cleaning products in the US. We move fast, test aggressively, and care about results — not excuses. If you love editing Meta ads that convert, this is for you.



Who are we?

We’re a young, ambitious e-commerce company selling premium cleaning products in the US through our brand Shiny Wipes. In the last two year we managed to hit multiple 7 figures in yearly revenue and aim for hitting 8 figures within the next 12 months. Our small but dynamic team is hungry for success, and we value continuous improvement, accountability, and respect in everything we do. If you're looking for more than a typical 9-5 job, eager to take on challenges, and ready to play a key role in our growth, you’ll fit right in.



What is our culture like & who is a good fit?

Culture-fit is our #1 factor when hiring! We have a genuine will-to-win. No work is beneath us if it moves us towards our goals. We utilize creativity to do more with less - and quickly. We use data to make decisions and live by the following core values: "work smart", "overdeliver", "speed is king" and "better everyday". We love learning - every problem is an opportunity to grow. This is not a chill corporate editing job. This is for people who want to get really good at performance creatives.



What You’ll Be Doing

Edit high-converting direct response video ads for Meta (UGC-style, hooks, iterations, winners).

Turn raw creator footage into scroll-stopping ads with strong pacing, captions, pattern interrupts, and clear CTAs.

Create multiple variations of winning creatives (hooks, angles, formats).

Collaborate closely with our creative strategist and marketing team.

Organize files and versions cleanly via Google Drive.



Requirements (Non-Negotiable):

Strong experience editing direct response ads for Meta 
 & Instagram)

Adobe Premiere Pro (must-have, daily tool)

Google Drive (file organization & collaboration)

Fluent in English (written & spoken)

40 hours/week availability (full-time, long-term)

You understand hooks, retention, psychology, pacing, subtitles, and conversion-focused editing

If you’ve never edited ads that were scaled with real spend — this role is not a fit.



Salary Expectation

Base salary of $1,500 USD per month.



How To Apply

When you apply, you must start your application with the code word: SHINY

Applications without the code word will be ignored.

Please include:

A short intro about yourself

Your experience with direct response / Meta ads

Links to relevant ad examples (not generic YouTube edits)

If you want to be part of a fast-growing brand, work with people who care deeply about performance, and sharpen your skills every week — we’d love to hear from you.

title: CONTENT RESEARCH EXPERT (CRE): $800 a month
description:
BENEFITS



- Full-time position: 7.5 hours/day

- Schedule: Monday to Friday, flexible time

- Salary: $800 a month

- Paid every two weeks via Wise. (direct to your bank account, almost no fees, no waiting for payday!)

- Full work-from-home flexibility

- A young, supportive team that values your output without micromanagement

- Clear growth path with opportunities to expand your role

- Join our international team working with established content creators and brands

- Work with the latest AI tools and social media platforms



TASKS



TASK #1: Research and Curate Viral Content



- Research 30-50 viral short-form videos on Instagram Reels and TikTok

- Strategically select content ideas that will help specific clients go viral

- Organize all content ideas in the "Client Master Sheet"

- Copy/paste links to each content piece

- Write out the hook of each content piece

- Categorize content (Hero Story, Educational, Entertaining, Promotional)

- Add precise video instructions on how each piece can be replicated



TASK #2: Provide Strategic Content Direction

- Identify and recommend 3 inspirational accounts for clients to follow in their niche

- Create detailed instructions for content replication tailored to the client's abilities

- Think strategically about what will help each client succeed

title: Online Math/Science Teacher(Near-Native Accent)
description:
About Pomelo Academy

Pomelo Academy is an innovative online international school dedicated to delivering high-quality education to students worldwide. We provide a dynamic and engaging learning environment, catering to individualized instruction that transcends geographical boundaries.



Job Description

We are seeking passionate and experienced Near-Native English-speaking Online K-12 Math and/or Science Teachers with verifiable teaching certifications. The ideal candidates will have strong academic backgrounds in Mathematics and/or Science, experience teaching young learners (ages 5–18), and a commitment to creating a supportive, inquiry-based, and engaging online learning environment.



Responsibilities



Deliver interactive and engaging Math and/or Science lessons to individuals and small groups of 2–6 students aged 5–18.

Teach using internationally recognized curricula such as A Closer Look, Glencoe Science, Pearson Interactive Science, NGSS-aligned resources, Singapore Math, or IB/AP/A Level Math programs.

Create age-appropriate lesson plans focused on conceptual understanding, inquiry, problem-solving, and real-world applications.

Incorporate visuals, multimedia, and hands-on virtual activities to make abstract concepts accessible and engaging.

Monitor student progress and provide timely feedback to students and parents.

Foster curiosity, discussion, and active learning in a safe and supportive space.



Qualifications



Professional teacher with at least 2 years of teaching experience (Kindergarten–Grade 12).

Must hold a valid teaching license/certification (e.g., Teaching License, State Certification). TESOL/TEFL is a plus.

Near-native English accent with excellent spoken and written communication skills.

Strong academic background in Mathematics and/or Science (Biology, Physics, Chemistry, General Science).

Experience teaching in public/international schools or reputable online platforms.

Familiarity with inquiry-based and/or interdisciplinary approaches (e.g., STEM/STEAM).

Comfortable working between 07:00–22:00 (Weekdays) and 9:00–22:00 (Weekends), GMT+8.

Proficiency with digital platforms such as ClassIn, Microsoft Office, and other educational technologies.

Must have a stable and fast internet connection and a PC/laptop with at least Windows 10 or Mac OS Catalina.



Benefits



Flexible working hours.

Opportunity to teach using globally respected Math and Science curricula.

Be part of an international, passionate team of educators.

Access to training and professional development.

Regular enrollment model (not a booking system), ensuring schedule stability and consistency

title: E-Commerce Video Strategist & AI Specialist
description:
Please submit only relevant portfolio samples or videos that showcase your short-form direct-response ads.



We’re hiring a skilled, performance-driven Video Editor to join our team full-time.



This is not just an editing role. You are a creative strategist who understands direct-response marketing. You know how to create scroll-stopping ads that drive measurable results across Meta, TikTok, and YouTube. This role goes beyond cutting clips — it’s about mastering conversion psychology, hooks, pacing, retention, and creative strategy. You’ll combine high-end editing skills with cutting-edge AI tools to produce winning creatives at scale. If you’re obsessed with performance, iteration, and staying ahead of emerging tech, we want to meet you.



Key Responsibilities:



1. Edit high-converting short-form ads (UGC, product demos, testimonials, comparison ads)

2. Craft compelling hooks within the first 3 seconds to maximize retention

3. Add captions, motion graphics, sound design, and platform-native elements

4. Collaborate with media buyers and creative strategists to optimize based on performance data

5. Organize and manage project files efficiently

6. Generate AI-assisted creatives using image and video generation tools

3. Create AI-generated UGC-style videos and product B-roll

Qualifications:

3. Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, CapCut, or similar tools

4. Deep understanding of TikTok-native and platform-first ad formats

6. Strong attention to detail and creative problem-solving skills

 subject line

Character & Mindset



1. Performance-oriented and results-driven

2. Proactive and self-motivated

3. Open to feedback and fast iteration

4. Strong communicator and collaborative team player

5. Adaptable in a fast-paced environment

How to Apply



Submit your:

title: Google Ads specialist
description:
Google Ads Specialist (Long-Term | Client-Facing | Strategy + Setup | White Label for UK Agency)

-Based)

title: [URGENT] Full Stack Web Developer - EST Timezon
description:
Position Overview



We are seeking a highly skilled and detail-oriented Full Stack Web Developer to join our team. This role is ideal for a developer who not only builds scalable web applications across the stack, but also understands system workflows, troubleshooting processes, and technical documentation.



The ideal candidate has strong front-end and back-end development experience, an analytical mindset, and the ability to read logs, interpret queries, and manage system configurations. Beyond coding, this role requires someone who can produce clear and structured technical documentation and confidently support operational and production environments.



This is a fully remote position aligned with EST business hours.



Key Responsibilities

• Design, develop, test, and deploy scalable web applications and system integrations.

• Build and maintain responsive, accessible front-end interfaces.

• Develop and maintain backend services and application integrations.

• Integrate applications with databases, third-party services, and internal systems.

• Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.

• Analyze system workflows to identify inefficiencies and improvement opportunities.

• Troubleshoot production issues by reviewing logs, queries, and configurations.

• Perform root cause analysis and implement sustainable technical fixes.

• Install, configure, and maintain custom software applications.

• Create and maintain clear and structured technical documentation, including examples such as user guides, FAQs, and standard operating procedures (SOPs).

• Use ticketing tools to track, manage, and resolve issues effectively.

• Solid understanding of relational and/or non-relational databases.

• Working knowledge of writing and analyzing database queries.

• Comfortable reading and interpreting application logs.

• Familiarity with system configurations and deployment environments.

• Experience installing and configuring software applications, particularly custom systems.

• Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills.

• Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

• Proven ability to produce clear, structured, and maintainable technical documentation.



Preferred / Plus Skills

• Experience handling system configurations and data-related troubleshooting.

description:

At LUCYD, we’re transforming the world of digital advertising with a focus on wellness, sustainability, and social responsibility. We specialize in compliant advertising for CBD, cannabis, and DTC wellness brands, and we're not just selling products—we're creating positive impact through Conscious Compounds™.



We’re looking for a Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) Specialist, with a specific focus on landing pages, to join our marketing team. Your main role will be to design, optimize, and analyze landing pages that drive paid social ad performance and increase eCommerce conversions. We look forward to working with you!

title: Branded Dropshipping Store Builder & Manager
description:
Branded Dropshipping Store Builder & Manager 

I’m looking for an initiative-taking, experienced ecommerce VA to help me build and test multiple branded dropshipping stores in 2026. I’ve done this before and now want to launch several new brands to test different products and angles.

This is NOT a beginner position. Please only apply if you already have experience with profitable Shopify / branded dropshipping stores.



What You’ll Be Doing

* Researching and validating products by solving pain points, not just chasing trends (problem-solving products, strong use cases, clear “why this works”).

* Doing community and competitor research (Reddit, TikTok, Meta Ad Library, Amazon reviews, etc.) to find real customer pains and objections, then turning them into hooks, angles, and offers.

* Building branded Shopify stores that do NOT look like generic dropshipping:

    * Clean, conversion-focused design

    * On-brand colors, fonts, and images

    * Trust elements (UGC, reviews, guarantees, FAQs, tracking, policies); contact reliable UGCs and have them create amazing content

* Creating high-converting product pages:

    * Story-driven copy that focuses on the problem, solution, and desired outcome

    * Clear benefits, before/after, FAQ, and objection handling

    * Bundles, AOV boosters, and simple upsells.

* Helping structure/testing Meta 
/IG) ads using 2026 playbooks:

    * Creative angles based on pain points and communities

    * Simple testing frameworks (multiple creatives, audiences, hooks)

    * Basic understanding of post-iOS/2026 Meta environment: creative-heavy, strong hooks, UGC style, focusing on CTR, CPM, CPA, and MER/ROAS.

* Coordinating with fulfillment and using dropshipping tools so operations run smoothly (fast processing, tracking, communication with suppliers).

* Helping document results and creating simple reports on product tests, winners/losers, and what to improve next.



Experience Required

You do NOT need to know “everything,” but you MUST have real, hands-on experience in these areas:

* Past work on at least 1–2 Shopify ecommerce / dropshipping stores that:

    * Looked like real brands (not AliExpress clone themes)

    * Hit healthy profit margins (not just revenue screenshots).

* Strong understanding of the new dropshipping model for 2025–2026:

    * Focusing on communities and problem/solution offers instead of random trending products

    * Building a brand/moat (better offers, better experience, repeat customers).

* Familiarity with tools similar to what Andy Stauring recommends, such as:

    * Shopify

    * AI store builders (e.g., BuildYourStore, Clone.store, or equivalents)

    * Product research tools (e.g., Minea or similar)

    * Fulfillment apps (e.g., AutoDS, TeemDrop or equivalents)

    * Meta Ad Library and basic use of AI tools (ChatGPT, etc.) for research and angles.

* Experience supporting Meta ad accounts for ecommerce (even if you weren’t the media buyer):

    * Setting up or editing creatives, copy, and product pages to improve performance

    * Understanding what winning creatives and offers usually look like in 2026.

If you’ve followed Andy Stauring, Jared Robinson, or similar creators and implemented their strategies, mention this.



Soft Skills & Work Style

* High attention to detail – you care about branding, spacing, copy, and user experience.

* Proactive – you bring ideas, not just wait for instructions.

* Comfortable testing, failing fast, and iterating.

* Good written English (clear, simple, persuasive).

* Loyal and long-term minded. I’m looking for someone to grow with the brand(s), not just do one-off tasks.



Tools / Tech Stack (You Should Know Most of These)

* Shopify 

* Meta Ads Manager (at least basic navigation)

* Meta Ad Library for creative research

* AI store/page builders (e.g., BuildYourStore, Clone.store, Atlas, or similar)

* Product research tools (Minea or similar)

* Fulfillment / automation tools (AutoDS, TeemDrop, or equivalents)

* Google Docs/Sheets, basic reporting.

You don’t need the exact same tools, but you must be comfortable learning equivalents fast.



Pay, Hours, and Growth

* Initial salary: competitive fixed monthly pay (to be discussed), starting as a trial to test skill, reliability, and culture fit.

* Workload: initially part-time, with the goal of moving to full-time as we see profitable results.

* Big upside: after you hit clear performance benchmarks (e.g., helping launch and scale profitable stores), there is potential for a 5–10% profit share of the store(s).

    * Example: If a store makes 100,000 USD/month in profit, you could earn 5,000–10,000 USD/month on top of or including your base, depending on our agreement.

I’m serious about rewarding someone who helps build real, long-term brands.



How To Apply

Send an
 to: 

1. Subject line: Branded Dropshipping VA – [Your Name]

2. A short intro: who you are, years of ecommerce experience, and what you’re best at.

3. Links or screenshots from 1–3 stores you’ve worked on:

    * What you specifically did on each store

    * Approx. best monthly revenue and profit margins (if you know them).

4. Examples of product pages or brands you helped create that do not look like generic dropshipping.

5. A brief breakdown (5–10 sentences) of:

    * How you would find and validate a pain-point product in 2026

    * How you’d structure a basic Meta testing campaign for it.

6. Your expected starting monthly salary in USD and available hours per week.



To get a sense of what the process of creating a store is like, check out this video:



I follow this creator (Andy Stauring) and trust his process.



I’m looking for someone who can think like a brand builder, not just a virtual assistant. Thanks!

title: SENIOR Product Listing Manager
description:
We are looking for a highly experienced Senior Product Listing Manager to manage and optimize product listings across our Shopify dropshipping stores.



This is a senior-level role. We are not looking for basic product uploaders. We need someone who understands structure, merchandising, conversion-focused listings, and how to manage product data at scale.



You will be responsible for overseeing the full product listing process, improving existing listings, and maintaining a clean, high-converting store structure.



What you will do:



– Manage and oversee all product listings across multiple Shopify stores

– Upload and structure products correctly (titles, descriptions, variants, tags, collections)

– Write and optimize conversion-focused product descriptions

– Maintain consistent formatting and brand voice

– Optimize product pages for clarity and usability

– Improve existing listings to increase conversion rates

– Organize collections and ensure logical product categorization

– Ensure product images are structured and displayed correctly

– Monitor product quality and consistency across the store

– Work closely with CRO and design team when improvements are needed



Requirements:



– Advanced Shopify experience (mandatory)

– Strong experience managing large product catalogs

– Proven experience in e-commerce or dropshipping

– Excellent English writing skills

– Strong understanding of product page structure and buyer psychology

– High attention to detail

– Ability to manage workflows independently

– Structured and organized mindset

title: Marketing & HubSpot Specialist
description:
About Us

We are Agentive (
), an AI-native delivery platform and services company helping organisations harness the power of AI for faster delivery, smarter automation, and measurable outcomes. We combine cutting-edge AI workflows with strategic process design to help businesses grow, transform, and scale.



Our work spans strategic AI consulting, AI employees, custom development solutions, and workflow optimisation, all designed to deliver real impact, not just recommendations.



Role Overview

We are seeking an experienced Marketing & HubSpot Specialist who understands that marketing success starts with strategy and process design, not just tool proficiency.



This role is for a marketer who can:

* Design intelligent, scalable sales and marketing processes

* Translate business goals into structured funnels and lifecycle stages

* Configure HubSpot and other tools to support those processes

* Integrate AI tools (including outbound lead platforms) to amplify performance



You will be responsible for end-to-end marketing strategy, execution, and optimisation for our SaaS and service offerings.



Key Responsibilities

* Design and document robust sales & marketing processes that guide prospects through lifecycle stages, from lead capture to qualification and conversion

* Translate business goals and buyer behaviours into structured marketing and automation workflows

* Configure and manage HubSpot CRM (pipelines, properties, lead scoring, lists, workflows, 360° tracking, reporting)

* Plan, build, and execute targeted campaigns 
, nurture journeys, inbound and outbound sequences)

* Integrate systems and tools including Apollo.io and other modern AI/automation platforms to create seamless lead flows

* Implement lead scoring, segmentation, and qualification frameworks

* Analyse campaign performance, iterate, and optimise based on data and strategic goals

* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure marketing » sales alignment and consistent messaging



Required Skills & Experience

* HubSpot expertise: CRM setup, automation workflows, campaign building, analytics

* Strategic marketing experience: designing full-funnel processes, not just using tools

* Proven track record with SaaS or tech service marketing

* Experience with Apollo.io or equivalent lead generation and AI-assisted platforms

* Strong
 marketing knowledge, including deliverability and lifecycle messaging

* Ability to translate business requirements into automated systems and dashboards

* Data-driven mindset with a focus on optimisation and measurable results



What We’re Looking For

* A strategic thinker who goes beyond tool operation

* A systems designer who can map processes and build frameworks

* A hands-on executor who deploys campaigns and measures impact

* A marketer who aligns marketing outcomes with business goals and the customer journey



Benefits

* Work with an innovative, AI-first organisation transforming how businesses operate

* Opportunity to shape and own the sales & marketing process

* Exposure to emerging AI technologies and platforms

* Collaborative environment focused on strategic impact and measurable outcomes



How to Apply

Please send us the following:

* Your updated CV / Resume

* A cover letter outlining your experience designing a full sales & marketing process (not just tool usage)

* A detailed example of a funnel or workflow you designed, including the why and the results

* A list of AI tools you’ve used, and how they contributed strategically to your campaigns

* Your expected project based salary (AUD)

* Availability (hours/week)



And put the word "Apollo" to show you read the entire post



Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

title: Senior Frontend Developer & UX/UI Designer (Design Engineer)
description:
Company: Agentive

Location: Remote (Philippines-based candidates preferred)

Type: Full-time

Experience: 5+ years



About Agentive

Agentive is building the future of software development: a self-improving, multi-agent AI system capable of building, delivering, and maintaining software projects autonomously. We are an early-stage startup with ambitious goals and a working prototype ready to scale.



We are backed by deep technical leadership. Our founder holds a PhD in Computer Science, brings 25+ years of IT consulting experience, and previously served as the Head of GenAI at a major consultancy. We are looking for exceptional talent to join us on this journey.



The Role

We are seeking a Senior Frontend Developer & UX/UI Designer (often called a Design Engineer). This is a true hybrid role for someone who thinks in pixels and code. You will own the entire user experience across our ecosystem, from the initial Figma prototype to the final production commit.



If you are a designer who hates handing off static files, or a developer who cares deeply about typography and micro-interactions, this role is for you. You will create interfaces that make complex AI multi-agent systems feel simple, magical, and intuitive.



What You Will Build

* Core Product Interfaces: Design and implement the UX for AgentiveCenter (our internal dashboard) and AgentiveHub (the customer-facing portal).

* Design System: Architect and maintain a scalable component library using Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui.

* Micro-SaaS Ecosystem: Design and build the frontend for 2-3 standalone SaaS applications we are launching.

* Data Visualization: Build complex, real-time dashboards that visualize AI agent activity, project health, and syste
trics.

* User Flows: Map out and implement intuitive workflows for complex operations (e.g., Human-in-the-Loop approvals, agent monitoring).



The Toolkit

We are looking for mastery in this specific stack:



Design & UX

* Figma: You don't just draw rectangles; you build interactive prototypes and organized design systems (Auto Layout, Variables, Components).

* User Research: You understand how to validate assumptions before writing code.



Frontend Engineering

* Core Stack: Next.js, React, and TypeScript.

* Styling: Tailwind CSS (Utility-first is your default).

* UI Libraries: shadcn/ui (or similar headless component libraries).

* Motion & Viz: Framer Motion, Recharts, or similar libraries for data visualization.



AI & Operations

* AI Coding Workflow: You must be a power user of Cursor or Claude Code. Use of these tools should be second nature to you (6+ months daily experience required).

* AI Design Tools: Familiarity with V0, Midjourney, or Figma AI is a strong bonus.

* Version Control: 3+ years of confidence with Git/GitHub in team environments.



Requirements

Must-Have

* 5+ years of professional experience in Frontend Development AND/OR UX/UI Design.

* 6+ months of daily, active use of AI coding assistants (Cursor, Copilot, Claude). Note: We expect you to code at "AI speed."

* Hybrid Portfolio: A portfolio that demonstrates both polished visual design and high-quality code implementation.

* Figma Mastery: You can create production-ready designs that are feasible to build.

* Tailwind Proficiency: You can style rapidly without relying on heavy custom CSS.

* Visual Taste: Strong grasp of typography, whitespace, color theory, and visual hierarchy.

* Communication: Excellent written and verbal English.



Nice to Have

* Experience scaling Design Systems across multiple products.

* Experience designing Developer Tools, SaaS Dashboards, or complex B2B interfaces.

* Background in data visualization.

* Familiarity with AI/ML interfaces.



The Mindset

* Design-Engineer Hybrid: You bridge the gap. You don't say "that's too hard to code"—you find a way to make it work.

* Pixel-Perfect & Pragmatic: You care about the 1px misalignment, but you also know when to ship V1.

* User-Obsessed: You advocate for the user in every architectural decision.

* AI-Native: You use AI tools not just to code faster, but to design smarter.

* Creator: You don't just follow a brief; you invent solutions.



What We Offer

* Competitive Salary: Based on experience and skill level.

* Remote-First: Work from anywhere (PH time zones preferred for collaboration).

* Equity: Stock options available for key hires.

* Creative Ownership: You will define the visual identity of the entire platform.

* Mentorship: Work directly with technical founders on cutting-edge AI.

* No Bureaucracy: Small team, fast decisions, results-oriented culture.



How to Apply

Please submit the following:

1. Resume/CV.

2. Portfolio: (Link to Behance, Dribbble, personal site, or PDF).

* Must show: UI/UX design work.

* Must show: Frontend code implementation (GitHub links or live sites).

* Ideal: Projects where you handled both design and code.

3. GitHub Profile.

4. AI Workflow Brief: Briefly describe your experience with AI tools (Which do you use? How do they fit into your design-to-code workflow?).

5. Video Introduction (Mandatory): A 3-5 minute video.

* Tell us about yourself.

* Walk us through your best design/code work. Explain your decisions.

* Explain why you want to join Agentive.

* Upload to YouTube (unlisted), Vimeo, or Google Drive and share the link.



Interview Process

1. Portfolio & Video Review: We evaluate your design sense and code quality.

2. Design Challenge: A small, specific task requiring both design and implementation (Window: 3-4 days).

3. Live Interview: Portfolio walkthrough and technical design discussion (1 hour).

4. Culture Fit: Conversation with the founder (30 min).

5. Offer: Extended within 1 week of the final interview.



Agentive is an equal opportunity employer.

title: Senior Software Engineer – Multi AI Agent Systems
description:
Product: AgentiveCore

Location: Remote (Philippines-based candidates preferred)

Type: Full-time

Experience: 5+ years



About Agentive

Agentive is building the future of software/IT development: a self-improving, multi-agent AI system capable of building, delivering, and maintaining software and IT projects autonomously. We are an early-stage startup with ambitious goals and a working prototype ready to scale.



We are backed by deep technical leadership. Our founder holds a PhD in Computer Science, brings 25+ years of IT consulting experience, and previously served as the Head of GenAI at a major consultancy. We are looking for exceptional talent to join us on this journey.



The Role

We are seeking a Senior Software Engineer to serve as a core developer for AgentiveCore—our proprietary multi-agent orchestration platform.



This is not a typical Python backend role. You will be building the infrastructure that powers the AI workforce: agent orchestration, distributed message queues, self-improvement loops, and human-in-the-loop governance systems.



You will work directly on the system that coordinates AI agents to deliver complex, complete software projects.



What You Will Build

•Agent Orchestration Systems: Design and implement architectures that coordinate multiple AI agents to collaborate on complex tasks.

•Self-Improvement Mechanisms: Create feedback loops that analyze agent performance to iteratively improve future generations.

•Distributed Communication: Build reliable, asynchronous messaging architectures for hierarchical agent teams.

•Human-in-the-Loop Workflows: Develop robust escalation systems for critical decisions requiring human oversight.

•Dynamic Configuration: Create flexible systems for on-demand agent creation and role assignment.



Technical Requirements

Must-Have Experience

•Python Expertise: 5+ years of professional development with Python (3.11+). Deep understanding of asyncio and aiohttp is non-negotiable.

•AI-Native Workflow: 6+ months of daily active use of AI coding tools (Cursor, Claude Code, GitHub Copilot). You don't just "know" these tools; they are integral to your speed and output.

•Architecture: Strong grasp of software architecture patterns, specifically regarding distributed systems.

•Containerization: Proficiency with Docker and containerized application deployment.

•Data & Messaging: Experience with message queue systems (RabbitMQ, Redis) and relational databases (PostgreSQL).

•LLM Integration: Experience integrating LLM APIs (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.) into production workflows.

•Prompt Engineering: Demonstrated ability to craft prompts that extract the best performance from LLMs.



Nice to Have

•Experience building multi-agent systems (e.g., AutoGen, LangChain, CrewAI) or distributed systems.

•Experience with NestJS or Node.js backend services.

•Familiarity with Kubernetes.

•Active contributions to open-source projects.



The Ideal Candidate Mindset

•Creator & Innovator: You don't just follow tickets; you invent solutions and build from first principles.

•AI-Obsessed: You are genuinely excited about the future of AI-assisted development and Autonomous Agents.

•High Agency: You are self-directed, take ownership, and drive projects forward without needing to be micromanaged.

•Fast Adapter: You are comfortable with the rapidly evolving AI landscape and can discard old methods when new, better tools emerge.

•Quality-First: You write clean, tested, and documented code that scales.



What We Offer

•Competitive Salary: Commensurate with experience.

•Remote-First: Work from anywhere (PH time zones preferred for collaboration).

•Equity Options: Ownership opportunities available for the right candidate.

•Direct Impact: Work on the core product engine, not peripheral features.

•Mentorship: Work directly with a founder who has deep expertise in CS and GenAI.

•No Bureaucracy: Small team, fast decisions, and a focus on results over clock time.



Application Process

To apply, please submit the following:

•Resume/CV: PDF format preferred.

•Code Portfolio: GitHub profile or specific code samples.

•AI Workflow Brief: A brief description of your experience with AI coding tools. Which tools do you use, how long have you used them, and how have they changed your workflow?

•Why Agentive?: A short paragraph explaining why you are excited about multi-agent AI systems.

•Video Introduction (Mandatory): A 3-5 minute video telling us about yourself, your technical background, and why you want to join Agentive.

•Please upload to YouTube (unlisted), Vimeo, or Google Drive and provide the link.



Interview Steps

•Resume Review: We review your application and video.

•Technical Screening: An async coding challenge designed to be solved using AI tools (Window: 2-3 days).

•Technical Interview: Live coding session and architecture discussion (1 hour).

•Culture Fit: Conversation with the founder (30 min).

•Offer: Extended within 1 week of the final interview.

title: YouTube and Instagram Video Editor (Cut Only)

title: Data Analyst and AI Engineer
description:
PET LET Holiday Homes



## About Us



PET LET Holiday Homes (
) is South Australia’s leading pet-friendly holiday rental management company, operating across the beautiful Fleurieu Peninsula with a portfolio of approximately 60 properties. We’ve been in business for 17 years and we’re growing — expanding into Adelaide and scaling our operations with smart, data-driven systems.



We have 14 years of booking data (across Google Sheets and our property management system) ready to be unified and put to work. That’s where you come in.



-----



## The Role



We’re looking for a talented hybrid **Data Analyst / AI Engineer** to help us build the intelligent tools that will drive our next phase of growth. This is a hands-on build role — you’ll be working directly with our leadership team to design, develop, and deploy AI-powered dashboards and decision-support tools from the ground up.



Starting at **20 hours per week**, this role has strong potential to grow as our systems develop or as we expand your work into other areas (eg building AI tools or apps) .



-----



## What You’ll Build



**Executive & Operations Dashboards**

Interactive dashboards covering CEO overview, bookings, operations, financials, and marketing performance — giving our team real-time visibility across the business.



**Property Appraisal Tool**

A client-facing tool we can use with prospective property owners to show them how their property could perform under our management. This needs to be compelling, professional, and data-driven — think occupancy rates, average daily rate, projected revenue, and benchmarking against comparable properties.



**Competitive Analysis & Benchmarking**

Scraping and analysing market data to understand where we sit against competitors and identify pricing and positioning opportunities.



**Dynamic Pricing Model**

A pricing engine that factors in booking lead times, seasonal demand, occupancy trends, average daily rates, local events, and more — helping us price smarter and increase revenue for both the business and our property owners.



-----



## Tech Stack



We use **NewBook** as our property management system, with data also held in **Google Sheets** (14 years of historical bookings). You’ll be integrating across multiple data sources including **Google Analytics**, our operations management system, and our accounting package. For the build, we’re recommending:



- **Python** (core language)

- **Pandas + SQL** (data wrangling)

- **Streamlit or Dash** (dashboard development)

- **Plotly** (data visualisation)

- **OpenAI API or equivalent** (AI/ML components)



If you have strong opinions about the stack, we’re open to hearing them — what matters is that it works, it’s maintainable, and it can be handed over cleanly.



-----



## You’re a Great Fit If You…



- Have 3+ years experience in data analytics and/or AI/ML engineering

- Are comfortable building client-facing tools, not just internal reports

- Have experience with Python-based dashboard development (Streamlit, Dash, or similar)

- Understand pricing models and revenue optimisation concepts

- Can work independently, communicate clearly in English, and manage your own time

- Have experience in the travel, hospitality, or short-term rental industry (a bonus, not a must)



-----



## What We Offer



- ?300/hr (negotiable depending on experience)

- 20 hours/week to start, with strong potential to grow

- Fully remote and flexible hours

- Direct access to leadership — no layers of bureaucracy

- A genuinely interesting dataset (14 years of holiday rental bookings across multiple systems) and real problems to solve

- A stable, long-running Australian business that’s serious about investing in technology



-----



## How to Apply



Send us a message with:



1. A brief intro — who you are and why this role interests you

1. Links to 2–3 relevant projects or work samples (dashboards, tools, models — whatever best represents your work)

1. Your hourly rate expectation

1. Your availability to start



We’ll move quickly with the right person.



-----



*PET LET Holiday Homes | 
 | Fleurieu Peninsula, South Australia*

Application Process – Read Carefully
